duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly service to all Customers
Assist other Crewmembers in completion of tasks and assignments to ensure continuity of service
Handle and prepare food following proper safety procedures
Clean tables, floors, and other areas of the Restaurant
Take orders from Customers and process payments efficiently
Multitask and work under pressure at a fast pace

education_certification.credential: Must be 16 years of age or older
